A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is about as bad as I (hope) it can get. No plot. Nothing to add to the overall saga. Horribly bad acting by Hamill. My 11 year old moaned for the two and a half hours\, while I just sat there sad.\nUPDATE 2019 - In preparation for the release of the FINAL Star Wars\, I went back and watched this movie again. It is the first half that I hated. The movie does improve. It is a giant disappointment after the strength of The Force Awakens. But\, it is tolerable. Let's hope the final installment reigns.
